title: The Little Gray Witch
description: Welcome to the Little Witch Academy! A place where all little witches can learn and grow. Meet the Little Gray Witch, who can't seem to hold onto her colors. She wants to be the meanest, baddest witch in the world. But the Little Gray Witch will soon discover the best witches aren't always the meanest. And being nice can have its own special rewards.
author: Laura Sass-Germain
